Package heap

Class HFPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • diskmgr.Page
      • heap.HFPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GlobalConst
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BTSortedPage 
    public class HFPage
extends Page
implements GlobalConst
    Class heap file page. The design assumes that records are kept compacted when deletions are performed.
